Container.Name: binhex-official-docker-registry-proxy
Container.Overview: A caching proxy for Docker; allows centralised management of (multiple) registries and their authentication; caches images from any registry. Caches the potentially huge blob/layer requests (for bandwidth/time savings), and optionally caches manifest requests ("pulls") to avoid rate-limiting.
